item.description:
Mohegan Sun Party Bus with $35 VIP Bonus and Music from BIG SHOT - Billy Joel Experience

SATURDAY JAN 29 - 6:15 pm to 12:15 am
Mohegan Sun Fun * Food * Music and New Friends with the CT Party Club

21 and over please
Play The Games - Shop - Check Out The Music
-AND HAVE A GREAT TIME!

PLUS

FREE CONCERT IN THE MOHEGAN SUN WOLF DEN

BIG SHOT - The Ultimate Billy Joel Experience

You can join the group to see the show,
or join the group playing in the Casino

The VIP bus trip includes a $35 VIP BONUS:

$20 Food voucher at any Mohegan Sun Restaurant and $15 of Playing Money


Your seat on the bus pays for itself because your
$35 VIP BONUS pays for your ticket!

We will arrive at Mohegan Sun at 6:00 pm,

( The VIP Bonus that you receive can be used to pay for your buffet,
or used at any shop or Restaurant at Mohegan Sun)

Next, you choose between playing at the Casino, Shopping, or a concert
with at the Wolf's Den at 8 pm

After the concert, enjoy Mohegan Sun until 12:15 am when our bus leaves

We have only 50 seats available on a privately chartered PARTY BUS
- so get your ticket before we sell out

ADVANCE TICKETS GUARANTEE YOUR SEAT * Only $40


TICKETS ON THE PARTY BUS ARE $50 IF ANY SEATS REMAIN
-call for availability

(860) FUN-5151
(860) 386-5151


BUS PICKUP SCHEDULE:

3:55 SHELTON
Route 8 - Bridgeport Avenue (Exit 13)

4:25 WATERBURY
I-84 - Route 69 (Exit 23) across from Brass City Mall

4:55 FARMINGTON
I-84 - Fienemann Rd. (Exit 37)

5:25 Glastonbury - Commuter Parking Lot on Main St Routes 2 & 3, Main St. (Exit 5)
(Route 3) Exit 5 off Route 2 Across from Burger King

* PLEASE ARRIVE EARLY - THERE ARE NO REFUNDS, SO PLEASE DO NOT MISS THE BUS *

* YOU MUST BE ON THE BUS TO RECEIVE YOUR $35 VIP BONUS BUCKS *

FOR COMMUTER PARKING LOT INFO - CLICK HERE

Arriving at 6:15pm for Dinner Buffet at Mohegan Sun

Concert starts at 8 pm


BIG SHOT, featuring the amazing vocals and piano of Michael DelGuidice, a well known and respected Long Island multi-instrumentalist. He is backed by one of the most dynamic and seasoned bands in the industry who, in addition to performing in concert with Billy Joel himself and his Broadway musical Movin’ Out, have also worked with Donna Summer, Roger Daltrey of The Who, Richie Blackmore, Tower of Power, Nine Days, Trans-Siberian Orchestra and many more. The band maintains an active concert calendar of over 120 dates a year performing corporate events, colleges, universities, private events, fairs, festivals, and sold out concert halls.

The show is packed with hit after chart-topping hit in a high energy, interactive stage performance. Aside from numerous uncanny renditions of Billy Joel's music, they will also astonish you with songs by Elton John, The Beatles, Journey, Paul McCartney, Marc Cohn, and many others including original songs from Michael’s recently released CD Miller Place. www.michaeldelguidice.com For Billy Joel fans and music fans, the choice is clear. If you want to hear songs recreated by a smokin' band, or if you just want to see one of the best live rock bands performing today, look no further than BIG SHOT.

The band often features special guest Richie Cannata, the original saxophone player of the Billy Joel Band from 1972 – 1982 who returned for Billy Joel’s record-setting 12-show run at Madison Square Garden in 2006. The list of Billy Joel recordings featuring Ritchie include: Songs In The Attic, 52nd Street, The Stranger, Glass Houses, Turnstiles, River Of Dreams, 2000 Years The Millennium Concert, and Billy's recent box set. Mark Rivera, current saxophone player of the Billy Joel band also regularly performs with Big Shot. Mark has been a member of Billy's band for over twenty years and has also performed with Ringo Starr, Foreigner and Peter Gabriel.

The band has had major press coverage including write up is the New York Times, Village Voice as well as television coverage on New York’s Channel 11 morning show

Be the first to know about our NEW EVENTS – Visit http://www.CTPartyClu... and sign up for our Email Newsletter

item.name: POSTPONED TO SAT FEB 19 DUE TO WEATHER- Mohegan Sun Party Bus with $35 VIP Bonus
